t: Amazon Music Logo, symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The logo came about after the merger of Amazon MP3 (a song store) and Amazon Cloud Player (a player for storing and listening to your favorite songs). ... An online platform with more than 50 million songs, available in part or full to subscribers from 50 countries for listening and buying. t: How to Purchase MP3s on an Android Device - Amazon Customer Service
s: Customers will now see the following message when shopping for MP3s through the Amazon Shopping App for Android: "Digital Music is not available for purchase from this device." This message is due to a change in the Google Play billing policy.
